pullrequest.title: Quick fix for config errors after qtutils 2 changes

content.raw:
No PyQt5 till now I'm planing to switch next week. 

I just deployed the qtutils2 stuff and abstraction layer today and let's just say the guys in the lab were not happy for 15 minutes... But this special case didn't come up in testing so what can you do? 

The problem occurs under qututils 2 with PyQt4 because the eval is something like "PyQt4.QString" and since there is no PyQt4 in the namespace things break. 

Your drag'n drop tabs are running in our lab for a week now no problems there till now. (I think I mentioned this somewhere)
content.html:
No PyQt5 till now I'm planing to switch next week.

I just deployed the qtutils2 stuff and abstraction layer today and let's just say the guys in the lab were not happy for 15 minutes... But this special case didn't come up in testing so what can you do?

The problem occurs under qututils 2 with PyQt4 because the eval is something like "PyQt4.QString" and since there is no PyQt4 in the namespace things break.

Your drag'n drop tabs are running in our lab for a week now no problems there till now. (I think I mentioned this somewhere)
